Package net.derquinse.common.orm.hib

Class Summary
AbstractHibernateDAO Abstract implementation for general and generic DAO.
AbstractHibernateSequenceDAO<T extends Sequence> Abstract DAO a sequence entity.
ByteStringUserType An hibernate user type representing a ByteString as a byte array.
Configurations Hibernate configurations support class.
HibernateEntityDAO<T extends Entity<ID>,ID extends Serializable> Implementation of the Generic DAO for entities.
HibernateGeneralDAO Implementation of the General DAO.
HibernateGenericDAO<T extends Entity<ID>,ID extends Serializable> Implementation of the Generic DAO.
HibernateSequenceDAO Data access object for the sequence entity.
LocaleUserType An hibernate user type representing a Locale as string.
MappedLongEntity Abstract superclass for model entities with an long primary key.
MappedLongVersionedEntity Abstract superclass for versioned model entities with an long primary key.
MappedStringEntity Abstract superclass for model entities with an string primary key.
MappedStringVersionedEntity Abstract superclass for versioned model entities with an string primary key.
MappedUUIDEntity Abstract superclass for model entities with an UUID primary key, stored in binary form.
MappedUUIDVersionedEntity Abstract superclass for versioned model entities with an UUID primary key, stored in binary form.
SequenceImpl Entity representing database row-backed sequences.
